snippet.title: King of Meat: Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Allow us to introduce you to the most-watched, sometimes controversial but always talked-about survival gameshow that is always looking for show-offs: KING OF MEAT! Get ready for a joyfully unhinged world filled with skeletons, trolls, and of course, corporate commercialism. 

Are you a Contender ready to destroy anything that steps into the Dungeon? Or are you a Creator, crafting the most devious challenges with your own dungeons? KING OF MEAT allows everyone to express their creativity, so join the mayhem and sign up for future playtests.

Learn more at https://bit.ly/4fDegtC

Steam: https://bit.ly/3SHJfe6
Sony: https://bit.ly/4fI83wD
Microsoft: https://bit.ly/4fFWIx2 

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL   
X: https://bit.ly/4dMoSVs 
Instagram: https://bit.ly/3M8SHU6 
Facebook: https://bit.ly/4fP0G6o
YouTube: https://bit.ly/4i2H6Vi

#KingofMeat #AmazonGames #AmazonGamesKingofMeat #AnnounceTrailer #KingofMeatAnnounceTrailer #PlayKingofMeat #GameplayTrailer #KingofMeatGameplay
